title: Receive Specimen in Lab
description: A lab technician receives a blood sample from a patient and needs to log it into the Laboratory Information System (LIS).

tasks.description: Scan the barcode on the specimen container.
tasks.expected_outcome: The LIS identifies the patient and the pending lab orders associated with the specimen.

tasks.description: Mark the specimen as 'Received' in the LIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system timestamps the receipt of the sample in the lab.

tasks.description: Place the specimen in the appropriate rack for testing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician physically stages the sample for the analyzer, and the LIS tracks its location.
